title: Mini lemon and lavender drizzle cakes

ingredients.item: 4 medium Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Eggs, beaten

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 180ºC, gas mark 4. Arrange 10 Waitrose Cooks’ Homebaking Mini Loaf Cases on a baking tray.
Cream together the butter and caster sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs and milk and fold in the flour. When it is completely incorporated, stir in the lemon zest.
Spoon the mixture into the cases. Bake in the oven for 20–25 minutes until risen, golden and a skewer comes out clean when inserted into the middle of the cakes.

Remove from the oven and leave to cool slightly. Meanwhile, make the topping: blitz 1 tbsp of the granulated sugar with the lavender until finely ground, then stir in the remaining sugar. Stir in the lemon juice and spoon over the warm cakes. Leave to cool completely before serving.
